com.mongodb.client

接口 MongoDatabase


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface MongoDatabase
    The MongoDatabase interface.

    Note: Additions to this interface will not be considered to break binary compatibility.

    从以下版本开始:
    3.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void createCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
      Create a new collection with the given name.
      void createCollection(java.lang.String collectionName, CreateCollectionOptions createCollectionOptions)
      Create a new collection with the selected options
      void createView(java.lang.String viewName, java.lang.String viewOn, java.util.List<? extends Bson> pipeline)
      Creates a view with the given name, backing collection/view name, and aggregation pipeline that defines the view.
      void createView(java.lang.String viewName, java.lang.String viewOn, java.util.List<? extends Bson> pipeline, CreateViewOptions createViewOptions)
      Creates a view with the given name, backing collection/view name, aggregation pipeline, and options that defines the view.
      void drop()
      Drops this database.

      Get the codec registry for the MongoDatabase.

      Finds all the collections in this database.

      Executes the given command in the context of the current database with a read preference of ReadPreference.primary().

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the database.
        返回:
        the database name

      • getCodecRegistry

        Get the codec registry for the MongoDatabase.
        返回:
        the CodecRegistry

      • getReadPreference

        ReadPreference getReadPreference()
        Get the read preference for the MongoDatabase.
        返回:
        the ReadPreference

        WriteConcern getWriteConcern()
        Get the write concern for the MongoDatabase.
        返回:

      • getReadConcern

        ReadConcern getReadConcern()
        Get the read concern for the MongoDatabase.
        返回:
        the ReadConcern
        从以下版本开始:
        3.2
        MongoDB documentation
        Read Concern
        Since server release
        3.2

      • withCodecRegistry

        MongoDatabase withCodecRegistry(CodecRegistry codecRegistry)
        Create a new MongoDatabase instance with a different codec registry.
        参数:
        codecRegistry - the new CodecRegistry for the database
        返回:
        a new MongoDatabase instance with the different codec registry

      • withReadPreference

        MongoDatabase withReadPreference(ReadPreference readPreference)
        Create a new MongoDatabase instance with a different read preference.
        参数:
        readPreference - the new ReadPreference for the database
        返回:
        a new MongoDatabase instance with the different readPreference

      • withWriteConcern

        MongoDatabase withWriteConcern(WriteConcern writeConcern)
        Create a new MongoDatabase instance with a different write concern.
        参数:
        writeConcern - the new WriteConcern for the database
        返回:
        a new MongoDatabase instance with the different writeConcern

      • withReadConcern

        MongoDatabase withReadConcern(ReadConcern readConcern)
        Create a new MongoDatabase instance with a different read concern.
        参数:

        返回:
        a new MongoDatabase instance with the different ReadConcern
        从以下版本开始:
        3.2

        Since server release

      • getCollection

        MongoCollection<Document> getCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
        Gets a collection.
        参数:
        collectionName - the name of the collection to return
        返回:
        the collection
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if collectionName is invalid
        另请参阅:
        MongoNamespace.checkCollectionNameValidity(String)

      • getCollection

        <TDocument> MongoCollection<TDocument> getCollection(java.lang.String collectionName,
                                                     java.lang.Class<TDocument> documentClass)
        Gets a collection, with a specific default document class.
        类型参数:
        TDocument - the type of the class to use instead of Document.
        参数:
        collectionName - the name of the collection to return
        documentClass - the default class to cast any documents returned from the database into.
        返回:
        the collection

      • runCommand

        Document runCommand(Bson command)
        Executes the given command in the context of the current database with a read preference of ReadPreference.primary().
        参数:
        command - the command to be run
        返回:
        the command result

      • runCommand

        Document runCommand(Bson command,
                    ReadPreference readPreference)
        Executes the given command in the context of the current database with the given read preference.
        参数:
        command - the command to be run
        readPreference - the ReadPreference to be used when executing the command
        返回:
        the command result

      • runCommand

        <TResult> TResult runCommand(Bson command,
                             java.lang.Class<TResult> resultClass)
        Executes the given command in the context of the current database with a read preference of ReadPreference.primary().
        类型参数:
        TResult - the type of the class to use instead of Document.
        参数:
        command - the command to be run
        resultClass - the default class to cast any documents returned from the database into.
        返回:
        the command result

      • runCommand

        <TResult> TResult runCommand(Bson command,
                             ReadPreference readPreference,
                             java.lang.Class<TResult> resultClass)
        Executes the given command in the context of the current database with the given read preference.
        类型参数:
        TResult - the type of the class to use instead of Document.
        参数:
        command - the command to be run
        readPreference - the ReadPreference to be used when executing the command
        resultClass - the default class to cast any documents returned from the database into.
        返回:
        the command result

      • drop

        void drop()
        Drops this database.
        MongoDB documentation
        Drop database

      • listCollectionNames

        MongoIterable<java.lang.String> listCollectionNames()
        Gets the names of all the collections in this database.
        返回:
        an iterable containing all the names of all the collections in this database

      • listCollections

        ListCollectionsIterable<Document> listCollections()
        Finds all the collections in this database.
        返回:
        the list collections iterable interface
        MongoDB documentation
        listCollections

      • listCollections

        <TResult> ListCollectionsIterable<TResult> listCollections(java.lang.Class<TResult> resultClass)
        Finds all the collections in this database.
        类型参数:
        TResult - the target document type of the iterable.
        参数:
        resultClass - the class to decode each document into
        返回:
        the list collections iterable interface
        MongoDB documentation
        listCollections

      • createCollection

        void createCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
        Create a new collection with the given name.
        参数:
        collectionName - the name for the new collection to create
        MongoDB documentation
        Create Command

      • createCollection

        void createCollection(java.lang.String collectionName,
                      CreateCollectionOptions createCollectionOptions)
        Create a new collection with the selected options
        参数:
        collectionName - the name for the new collection to create
        createCollectionOptions - various options for creating the collection
        MongoDB documentation
        Create Command

      • createView

        void createView(java.lang.String viewName,
                java.lang.String viewOn,
                java.util.List<? extends Bson> pipeline)
        Creates a view with the given name, backing collection/view name, and aggregation pipeline that defines the view.
        参数:
        viewName - the name of the view to create
        viewOn - the backing collection/view for the view
        pipeline - the pipeline that defines the view
        从以下版本开始:
        3.4
        MongoDB documentation
        Create Command
        Since server release
        3.4

      • createView

        void createView(java.lang.String viewName,
                java.lang.String viewOn,
                java.util.List<? extends Bson> pipeline,
                CreateViewOptions createViewOptions)
        Creates a view with the given name, backing collection/view name, aggregation pipeline, and options that defines the view.
        参数:
        viewName - the name of the view to create
        viewOn - the backing collection/view for the view
        pipeline - the pipeline that defines the view
        createViewOptions - various options for creating the view
        从以下版本开始:
        3.4
        MongoDB documentation
        Create Command
        Since server release
        3.4
